str2: Of time: when, after; of cause: since, because; otherwise: else. From epi and ei; thereupon, i.e. Since.
Of Hebrew origin; Judas, the name of ten Israelites; also of the posterity of one of them and its region.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From glossa and the base of kosmos; properly, a case i.e. a casket or purse.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb, doko dok'-o of the same meaning; to think; by implication, to seem.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To buy. From agora; properly, to go to market, i.e. to purchase; specially, to redeem.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Neuter Plural
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
From the base of chraomai or chre; employment, i.e. An affair; also occasion, demand, requirement or destitution.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A festival, feast, periodically recurring. Of uncertain affinity; a festival.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Poor, destitute, spiritually poor, either in a good sense (humble devout persons) or bad.
